description: Upward Mobility’s CompTIA Linux+ LX-101 / LX-102 Exam Prep app for Palm webOS is a valuable tool to help you achieve CompTIA's Linux+ certification.  107 simulated exam questions cover all topics on the exam, including Basic Commands, User Management, Storage Devices and Partitions, Package Concepts, Networking, Security, Documentation, and Hardware.    *  Each question is paired with a concise but detailed explanation and a Key Takeaway.  The Key Takeaway is designed to ensure that the crucial learning point of the question is mastered.  Not only that, Key Takeaways support the answer with important insights on how to practically apply the knowledge in a real world situation so you can be more successful in your career.  ||  The CompTIA Linux+ certification demonstrates competency as a Linux Administrator.   *  The Linux+ Certification is powered by LPI, and candidates can have their exam forwarded to the Linux Professional Institute to achieve the LPIC-1 Certification.  ||  Upward Mobility creates high quality management education and test preparation material that is witty, engaging, and adds value in the learning process.  We hire only expert writers who have strong knowledge in the subject matter and put all of our materials through a thorough review process.  *   We are a double bottom line company committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries.
